meanings.definition: A widely acclaimed star, especially in the entertainment industry.
meanings.sent1: The concert was filled with superstars who sang beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Many people dream of becoming superstars in Hollywood.
meanings.sent3: The movie about talking animals had superstars voicing the characters.
meanings.sent4: In the galaxy of music, she shone like a superstar among the stars.
meanings.sent5: The stadium erupted in cheers as the superstars took the stage.

meanings.definition: A person who is extremely popular and successful in their field.
meanings.sent1: The athlete was considered one of the superstars of the team.
meanings.sent2: Social media influencers are modern-day superstars.
meanings.sent3: The chef became a superstar after his cooking video went viral.
meanings.sent4: She was a superstar in the world of fashion, always setting trends.
meanings.sent5: The young author quickly rose to become a literary superstar.
